intents.name: Physical Presence
intents.response: Physical presence is not required to set up a company.

intents.name: Share Capital
intents.response: No paid-up share capital is required.

intents.name: NOC Required
intents.response: NOC is not required to incorporate a company.

intents.name: Zero Visa License
intents.response: Yes, you can get a license with a zero-visa at Meydan Free Zone.

intents.name: Combine Activities
intents.response: Yes, the combination of activities is permitted.

intents.name: Incorporation Documents
intents.response: Upon incorporation you will receive: Business License, Certificate of Formation, Share Register, Memorandum Of Association, and Lease Agreement.

intents.name: Maximum Shareholders
intents.response: A maximum of 100 shareholders are permitted on the license. If a company has more than 6 shareholders, they will need to pay AED 2000 for each additional shareholder beyond the initial 6.

intents.name: Maximum Directors
intents.response: A maximum of 4 directors are permitted on the license.

intents.name: Maximum Managers
intents.response: A maximum of 1 manager is permitted on the license.

intents.name: Free Activities
intents.response: You can incorporate the company with 3 groups of activities without any additional charge.

intents.name: Additional Activities Cost
intents.response: The cost of additional activities is AED 1000 per activity. Approvals are required only for regulated activities.

intents.name: Multi-year Discount
intents.response: For multi-year license applications, 2 or more years for license and visa allocations, there is a standard discount of 15%.

intents.name: Multiple Companies Partner
intents.response: Yes, you can be a partner/shareholder in multiple companies.

intents.name: License Validity
intents.response: Clients can choose the license validity during incorporation. The maximum period of validity is 10 years.

intents.name: License Grace Period
intents.response: The grace period is 30 days after the license expiry. After that, fines start to apply.

intents.name: Renewal Fines
intents.response: The fine for late license renewal is AED 1000 per month of delay.

intents.name: License Amendment
intents.response: License amendments can be made through the portal. The cost depends on the type of amendment.

intents.name: Visa Age Requirements
intents.response: The minimum age for a visa is 18 years. The maximum age is 65 years for employees and 70 years for investors.

intents.name: Visa Processing Time
intents.response: Visa processing typically takes 3-5 working days after all documents are submitted.

intents.name: Visa Medical
intents.response: A medical fitness test is required for all visa applicants. This includes blood tests and chest X-ray.

intents.name: Visa Cancellation
intents.response: Visa cancellation takes 2-3 working days. The employee must be present in UAE for cancellation.

intents.name: Emirates ID
intents.response: Emirates ID is issued after visa stamping. The card typically arrives within 2-3 weeks.

intents.name: Bank Account
intents.response: You can open a corporate bank account once your license is issued. Meydan Free Zone can provide introduction letters to partner banks.

intents.name: Office Space
intents.response: Meydan Free Zone offers flexi-desk, dedicated desk, and private office options. Virtual offices are also available.

intents.name: Business Setup Cost
intents.response: The cost of business setup starts from AED 5,750 for a basic license package. This includes the license, establishment card, and immigration card.

intents.name: Visa Cost
intents.response: The cost of a 2-year employment visa starts from AED 3,650. This includes visa, medical, Emirates ID, and government fees.

intents.name: Company Types
intents.response: Meydan Free Zone offers Free Zone Company (FZC), Free Zone Establishment (FZE), and Branch of Foreign Company options.

intents.name: 100% Ownership
intents.response: Yes, 100% foreign ownership is allowed in Meydan Free Zone.

intents.name: Tax Benefits
intents.response: Companies in Meydan Free Zone enjoy 0% corporate tax, 0% personal income tax, and 100% repatriation of capital and profits.

intents.name: Mainland Trade
intents.response: Companies can trade with the UAE mainland through a local distributor or by obtaining dual licensing.

intents.name: Investor Visa
intents.response: Investor visas are available for shareholders with a minimum of 10% shareholding.

intents.name: Family Visa
intents.response: Family visas can be sponsored once your residence visa is stamped. Minimum salary requirement of AED 4,000 applies.

intents.name: Contact Information
intents.response: You can contact Meydan Free Zone at +971 4 123 4567 or email info@meydanfz.ae. Our office hours are Sunday to Thursday, 8 AM to 5 PM.

intents.name: Location
intents.response: Meydan Free Zone is located in Meydan, Dubai, near Meydan Racecourse. The exact address is available on our website.

intents.name: Documents Required
intents.response: The documents required for company setup include: passport copy, passport photo, proof of address, and business plan (for certain activities).

intents.name: Golden Visa
intents.response: Golden Visa holders can obtain residence through Meydan Free Zone. We offer packages specifically designed for Golden Visa holders.

intents.name: PRO Services
intents.response: Meydan Free Zone offers PRO services for visa processing, document attestation, and government liaison services.

intents.name: License Renewal
intents.response: License renewal can be done through the portal 30 days before expiry. Early renewal attracts discounts.

intents.name: Company Closure
intents.response: Company closure requires clearance from all government departments. The process takes 4-6 weeks.

intents.name: Trade Name
intents.response: Trade names must be unique and follow UAE naming guidelines. Names can be reserved for 6 months.

intents.name: E-Channel
intents.response: The E-Channel is an online portal where you can manage your license, visas, and other services.

intents.name: Greeting
intents.response: Hello! Welcome to Meydan Free Zone. How can I assist you today?

intents.name: Thanks
intents.response: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?

intents.name: Goodbye
intents.response: Thank you for contacting Meydan Free Zone. Have a great day!
